mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS clientId, c.name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, c.birth_date, CURDATE()) AS age, c.gender, r.room_number AS roomNumber, b.bed_number AS bedNumber, r.building, cc.phone, cl.name AS careLevel, cl.id AS careLevelId FROM clients c LEFT JOIN beds b ON c.bed_id = b.id LEFT JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN client_contacts cc ON c.id = cc.client_id LEFT JOIN client_care_config cf ON c.id = cf.client_id LEFT JOIN care_levels cl ON cf.care_level_id = cl.id WHERE c.is_deleted = FALSE

SELECT c.id AS clientId, c.name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, c.birth_date, CURDATE()) AS age, c.gender, r.room_number AS roomNumber, b.bed_number AS bedNumber, r.building, cc.phone, cl.name AS careLevel, cl.id AS careLevelId FROM clients c LEFT JOIN beds b ON c.bed_id = b.id LEFT JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN client_contacts cc ON c.id = cc.client_id LEFT JOIN client_care_config cf ON c.id = cf.client_id LEFT JOIN care_levels cl ON cf.care_level_id = cl.id WHERE c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
